name: Garlic-Parsley Butter (Beurre Maître d'Hôtel)
description: A classic compound butter flavored with parsley, garlic, and lemon. It's perfect for grilled steak, seafood, or vegetables.
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon (15ml) juice plus 2 teaspoons (10ml) zest from 1 lemon
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Combine butter, parsley, lemon juice and zest, and garlic in the bowl of a food processor (see note) and pulse until garlic and herbs are chopped and lemon juice is incorporated. Season to taste with salt and pepper and pulse to combine. Wrap butter tightly and store in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks or in the freezer for several months.
